actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for allergenic extracts, whether or not administered by the physician who prepared them.

summary.text: Authorizes the payment under the Supplementary Medical Insurance Program under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act for allergenic extracts, whether or not administered by the physician who prepared them.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the supplementary medical insurance program for allergenic extracts, whether or not administered by the physician who prepared them.
